EmailTemplate.name: eCommerce Freshop Campaign.05-13-2021 RET eCommerce Freshop Campaign Email 1.Sub
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Unlock Your Grocery eCommerce Potential
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> By 2023, online grocery sales will reach $129.72 billion. And they’ll account for nearly 10% of total grocery sales. To stay competitive with this new grocery industry norm, retailers must embrace the future of eCommerce as an essential piece of their strategy. But all experiences aren’t the same. To enable the best experience, you need a cloud-based platform that effortlessly integrates into your existing tech ecosystem and provides a fast, easy and seamless experience—for your customers and your employees. Join NCR’s upcoming webinar with Progressive Grocer to learn how to stay competitive in the marketplace and increase your customer engagement. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
